page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content: Mrs.J.Lambert is headteacher of Wallerscote Primary School in Weaverham.She was previously head of Wallerscote Infants until the infant and Junior Schools merged in 1984. Mrs.Lambert is in charge of the school and 15 members of staff.She has to be available to sort out problems with the childrens parents.She holds Staff Meetings once a fortnight.She must check that the day to day running of the School goes smoothly:central heating for example.She must reappoint when teaching posts become vacant.She also teaches Mathematics,this is not her specialist subject but the subject where children need most help. Mrs.Lambert works 40 hours a week and by Friday is exhausted!
